Source.Name: libxscrnsaver
Source.Summary: X11 Screen Saver extension client library
Source.Description: The Screen Saver extension allows clients behaving as screen savers to register themselves with the X server, to better integrate themselves with the running session.

Package.Name: libxscrnsaver-32bit
Package.Description: The Screen Saver extension allows clients behaving as screen savers to register themselves with the X server, to better integrate themselves with the running session.

Package.Description: The Screen Saver extension allows clients behaving as screen savers to register themselves with the X server, to better integrate themselves with the running session.
